description:
Director of the Seito Sannomiya Private School. The daily activity and such are left to Sannomiya Chieko (principal) and Mukogawa Reiko (vice-principal).
He is against the principal`s wish for only female teachers and converting the school into an all-girls school.
He thinks good of Hibiki-sensei.
He sets up an omiai between Hibiki and his nephew, Yoshio, without knowing his feelings thus Yoshio ends up declining the offer - much to Hibiki`s joy.
name: Tokugawa Yachio
